methods.newExportId:
Advanced usage, creates a new export ID for this session, but must be managed by the caller. Useful for
 more advanced integrations, particularly around doPut. Callers are responsible for releasing the export ID if necessary.

:return: (io.deephaven.client.impl.ExportId) the new export ID
methods.release:
Releases an export ID.

 
 Note: this should only be called in combination with exports returned from newExportId().

:param exportId: (io.deephaven.client.impl.ExportId) - the export ID
:return: (java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void>) the future

text: A session represents a client-side connection to a Deephaven server.
